chunk: Directions: After cleansing, use a cotton pad to smooth Glycolic toner over entire face, avoiding eye area. Follow with Glycolic Resurfacing Cream or the Glo Skin Beauty moisturizer best suited to your skin type. Use 5-7 times per week. If irritation occurs, reduce use.
